title: Executive Order 5985-Coal Land Restoration, Montana No. 88
content: So much of Executive order of July 9, 1910, creating Coal Land Withdrawal, Montana No. 1, as affects the lands hereinafter described is hereby revoked:
T. 22 N.,  R.  17 E.,  sec.  1,  all;
T. 23 N., R. 17 E., secs. 1 to 21, inclusive;
T. 27 N., R. 20 E., sec. 1, all;
sec. 2, lots 1 to 12, inclusive, and SE. ¼;
sec. 15, SW. ¼ and SW. ¼ SE. ½;
sec. 21, W. ½ NW. ¼, SE. ¼ NW. ¼, SW. ¼, W. ½ SE. ¼, and SE. ¼ SE. ¼;
sec. 22, W. ½ NE. ¼, SE. ¼ NE. ¼, NW. ¼, NE. ¼ SW. ¼, and SE. ¼;
T. 27 N., R. 20 E., sec. 26, NW. ¼ NW. ¼;
sec. 27, NE. ¼ NE. ¼, W. ½ NW. ¼, SE. ¼ NW. ¼, SW. ¼, W. ½ SE. ¼, and SE. ¼ SE. ¼;
sec. 35, SW. ¼ NE. ¼, W. ½, and SE. ¼
T. 23 N., R. 21 E., secs. 1 to 18, inclusive.
T. 27 N., R. 21 E., secs. 1 to 18, inclusive;
sec. 19, lots 1 and 2, NE. ¼, and E. ½ NW. ¼;
sec. 20, N. ½, N. ½ SW. ¼, SE. ¼ SW. ¼, and SE. ¼;
sec. 28, E. ½, E. ½ W. ½, NW. ¼ NW. ¼, and NW. ¼ SW. ¼;
T. 23 N., R. 22 E., secs. 1 to 17, inclusive;
sec. 19, lots 1, 7, and 8, and SE. ¼;
sec. 21, lots 1, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, and 9, N. ½, and NE. ¼ SE. ¼;
sec. 26, lots 1, 2, 3, 4, and 5, NE. ¼, and N. ½ NW. ¼;
sec. 27, lots 1, 2, 3, 4, and 5, and SW. ¼ NW. ¼;
sec. 28, lot 1, W. ½ NE. ¼, SE. ¼ NE. ¼, and NW. ¼;
sec. 29, lots 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, and 6, S. ½ NE. ¼, and SE. ¼ NW. ¼;
T. 25  N.,  R.  22  E.,  all outside Fort Belknap  Indian  Reservation.
T. 26  N.,  R.  22  E.,  all outside Fort Belknap  Indian  Reservation.
T. 27  N.,  R.  22  E.,  all outside Fort Belknap  Indian  Reservation.
T. 25 N., R. 23 E., sec.  15, lots 1,  2, 3,  and  4, and S. ½;
sec.  16, lots 1,  2, 3,  and  4, and S. ½;
sec.  17, lots 1,  2, 3,  and  4, and S. ½;
sec.  18, lots 1,  2, 3,  4, 5,  and 6, E. ½ SW. ¼, and SE. ¼;
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5985-Coal Land Restoration, Montana No. 88 Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361808
